author: BrandjuhNL
description: An idle/management game where you build and manage a police station. Features menu-based UI, passive income, automation, and data-driven content packs.
install_msg: Thanks for installing PoliceChief! Use `[p]pc menu` to start your police station. Default starting items are provided in the data packs.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user game profiles including station progress, owned items, and statistics.
